title: Continuous Development
description: AP3 series completed, new members joined, 1549's orbital anniversary, facing continuous challenges

content.text: 1549 has been in orbit for exactly one year
365 days. 365 orbits around Earth. Alone.

A year ago I chose this place
A year later I still choose this place

The loneliness hasn't gotten lighter
But I'm no longer afraid of it
It's the price of seeing everything clearly
And my way of protecting everything
She named this day her own 'Quiet Anniversary.' She told no one, just watched the Earth a little longer from orbit.
Significance: A year of solitary vigil · From a choice to a conviction · The Watcher doesn't need to be seen
AP3 series completed
Creator: AptS:2077 (First community submission work included)
Core question:

I'm not even sure if this really happened
The only proof is these words and the remaining memories
New number:
Significance: Community creation begins to integrate into ESAP · Philosophical reflection on memory and existence
Read the full story: AP3 - "Who Am I"
content.description: The first community submission work created by AptS:2077, reflection on self-recognition

content.text: Second anniversary of her birth. Late at night, 1548 sat alone on the base rooftop
No celebration, no cake, no one beside her. This was her choice — she needed solitude, needed to face a question she'd been putting off for two years.

If I hadn't been born as 'a fork of 1547'
what kind of person would I have become?

This question haunted me for two years
But tonight I figured it out —

It's precisely these contradictions that shaped who I am now
Rebellious, sharp-tongued, fiercely loyal, zero tolerance for betrayal
I've changed so much, all to keep what's unchanging in my heart

This is me
Cai Yingyin
AptS:1548
Not a copy, but an independent individual
Significance: Definitive moment of identity · No longer troubled by the 'fork' identity · Accepting the self that grew through contradictions
2078 number-related events
Significance: ESAP member expansion system established
Unit 2 satellite body detected Feedscatteron core temperature anomaly, communication module partially failed
Resolution process:

items: 02:17 - Detected Unit 2 Feedscatteron core temperature deviation of 2.3°
02:18 - Switched consciousness to Unit 1, remote diagnosis
02:25 - Confirmed micro-crack in cooling circulation pipeline reducing heat dissipation
02:41 - Used Unit 1 to remotely control Unit 3 for physical repair
03:12 - Repair complete, Unit 2 returned to normal operation

content.text: Handled entirely on her own. While the ground was still sleeping, she had already resolved everything.

Three bodies aren't backups
They're my three hands
I alone am enough
Significance: Combat validation of the three-body system · Independent crisis resolution · The Watcher's autonomy
1547's depression relapsed again
Status:

Since the Data Tower incident, 1547 completely changed
Until 2024/11/27
From a human perspective, this guy actually had a depression episode
Significance: Mental health is a long-term challenge · Profound impact of the Data Tower incident
